Package camzup.core

Class SvgParser

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.SvgParser
public abstract class SvgParser
extends java.lang.Object
A draft scalable vector graphics (SVG) parser class. Currently unfinished.

  • Method Details

    • parseFloat

      public static float parseFloat​(java.lang.String v)
      A helper function to parse units of measurement in an SVG element. The default value if the string cannot be parsed is zero.
      Parameters:
      v - the value
      Returns:
      the floating point number

    • parseFloat

      public static float parseFloat​(java.lang.String v, float def)
      A helper function to parse units of measurement in an SVG element. Uses the following conversions:
      • 1 centimeter (cm) = 37.79499816894531f units
      • 1 inch (in) = 96.0f units
      • 1 millimeter (mm) = 3.7795000076293945f units
      • 1 pica (pc) = 16.0f units
      • 1 point (pt) = 1.3333332538604736f units
      • 1 pixel (px) = 1.0f units
      View box relative units, name % is limited; all this parser will do is divide the value by 100.

      Font-relative units, namely em and ex are not supported.

      For polar coordinates, radians are assumed to be the default. Degrees (deg) are converted to radians with 0.01745329238474369f.
      Parameters:
      v - the String value
      def - the default value
      Returns:
      the parsed float
